SQL: SELECT DISTINCT P112.AREA_NAME, P113.MODEL_NO, P67.INSTRUMENT_COMP_NO, ROUND(P67.FACE_TO_FACE_DIM,0), (P67.CP_1_NOM_PIPE_DIAM-5000)/32, P67.CP_1_END_PREP, P67.CP_1_SCH_THK, P67.CP_1_RATING, (P67.CP_2_NOM_PIPE_DIAM-5000)/32, P67.CP_2_END_PREP, P67.CP_2_SCH_THK, P67.CP_2_RATING, (P67.CP_3_NOM_PIPE_DIAM-5000)/32, P67.CP_3_END_PREP, P67.CP_3_SCH_THK, P67.CP_3_RATING, ROUND (P170.CP_EASTING,0), ROUND (P170.CP_NORTHING,0), ROUND (P170.CP_ELEVATION,0), P12.LINE_NUMBER_LABEL, P12.LINE_ID FROM MTO_{PROJECTNAME}.PDTABLE_67 P67, MTO_{PROJECTNAME}.PDTABLE_12 P12, MTO_{PROJECTNAME}.PDTABLE_170 P170, PD_{PROJECTNAME}.PDTABLE_112 P112, PD_{PROJECTNAME}.PDTABLE_113 P113 WHERE P67.CP1_IDX_12=P12.SYSTEM_UNIQUE_NO AND P12.PARTITION_NO=P113.PARTITION_NO AND P112.AREA_INDEX_NO=P113.AREA_INDEX_NO AND P112.DISCIPLINE_INDX_NO=1 AND P67.PARTITION_NO=P170.PARTITION_NO AND P170.TABLE_UNIQ_NO=P67.SYSTEM_UNIQUE_NO AND P170.CONNECT_POINT_NO=1 AND P170.TABLE_NO=67 ORDER BY P112.AREA_NAME, P113.MODEL_NO, P67.INSTRUMENT_COMP_NO
